mapper.sql: id, bidder_apply_id, certification_id, certification_name, certification_content, expire_time, applicable_region, certification_no, industry_id
mapper.select: select i.industry_name projectTypeName,m.applicable_region,m.certification_no,m.industry_id as projectType,m.certification_name as eqName,t.certification_level eqRating,m.certification_content,m.expire_time as expiryDate from t_qyzz_bidder_certification_certification m INNER JOIN t_qyzz_bidder_certicate u on m.certification_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_base_certification_type t on m.id = t.id inner join t_base_industry i on i.id = m.industry_id where u.id = #{bidder_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and and u.status != 'DIS'

select m.id eqId,m.certification_id,i.industry_name projectTypeName,m.applicable_region,m.certification_no,m.industry_id as projectType,m.certification_name as eqName,t.certification_level eqRating,m.certification_content,m.expire_time as expiryDate from t_qyzz_bidder_certification_certification m INNER JOIN t_qyzz_bidder_certicate u ON m.bidder_apply_id = u.id LEFT JOIN t_base_certification_type t ON m.certification_id= t.id LEFT JOIN t_base_industry i ON i.id = m.industry_id where u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and u.status != 'DIS'
mapper.insert: insert into t_qyzz_bidder_certification_certification (id, bidder_apply_id, certification_id, certification_name, certification_content, expire_time, applicable_region, certification_no, industry_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{certificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{certificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{applicableRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_qyzz_bidder_certification_certification
id,
bidder_apply_id,
certification_id,
certification_name,
certification_content,
expire_time,
applicable_region,
certification_no,
industry_id,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update t_qyzz_bidder_certification_certification
bidder_apply_id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
certification_id = #{certificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
certification_name = #{certificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certification_content = #{certificationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE},
applicable_region = #{applicableRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
certification_no = #{certificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_qyzz_bidder_certification_certification set bidder_apply_id = #{bidderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, certification_id = #{certificationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, certification_name = #{certificationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification_content = #{certificationContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expire_time = #{expireTime,jdbcType=DATE}, applicable_region = #{applicableRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, certification_no = #{certificationNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry_id = #{industryId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
